articles.title: Preschoolers are using apps meant for adults, study finds - CNN
articles.description: A new study has found parents aren't up on their preschooler's screen time, nor are they aware of the many violent and adult options these young children are accessing. Parents should remain vigilant on the type of content their child is viewing.
